jam.global
Class ComponentPrintable

java.lang.Object
  jam.global.ComponentPrintable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.print.Printable
public class ComponentPrintable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.print.Printable

Utility wrapper class for taking a Component making it Printable. See p. 287 of "Java 2D Graphics" by Jonathan Knudsen.

Version:
Jan 22, 2004
Author:
Jonathan Knudsen, Dale Visser
